p:
Fomivirsen is a 21-nucleotide phosphorothionate oligonucleotide complementary to messenger RNA (mRNA) of the immediate-early region of CMV.
55- 57 Its antiviral property is exerted by antisense inhibition of target gene expression. Other potential mechanisms of antiviral activity include its nonspecific interactions with viral particles that may prevent adsorption or lead to inhibition of enzymes required for viral DNA synthesis.
